name: Primary Care
description: Primary Care is Health services that cover a range of prevention, wellness, and treatment for common illnesses,we combine medical excellence with advanced technology to diagnose and treat vascular disease.

name: Heart Care
description: We are Providing Compassionate Care for All of You. we specialize on Heart Care.we combine medical excellence with advanced technology to diagnose and treat heart and vascular disease.

name: Maternity Care
description: Maternity services Covered services for expecting mothers and babies,Maternity care refers to the health services provided to women, babies, and families throughout the whole pregnancy, during labour and birth, and after birth for up to six weeks

name: Urgent Care
description: We Provide 24 hours Urgent Health Services For You,Dont delaymergency Department is ready to care for you whether you are having a heart attack, if you think you are, or if you are experiencing any other type of cardiovascular emergency

name: Rehab Center
description: If you are an alcoholic or is suffering from drug usage, a drug Aqua Health Care is your best bet.Care for patients who have experienced a debilitating illness,injury or major surgery,we are here for you

name: Radiology Services
description: We have Radiology Services That provides CT, X-ray,MRI,Nuclear Medicine etcDiagnostic radiology refers to the field of medicine that uses non-invasive imaging scans to diagnose a patient.
